summary: Donald Trump claims during a debate in Trump North Dakota on June 28th, 2018 that the blue wave, referring to the Democratic Party's anticipated success in the upcoming elections, is sputtering badly. He argues that a red wave, representing the Republican Party's success, is happening instead. Trump suggests that famous people who were present at the event will become even more famous in the future.

Donald Trump claimed during a debate in Trump North Dakota on June 28th, 2018 that Democrats constantly complain about being too rough on ICE. He asked the audience if they believed it and pointed out the actions of Democrats, suggesting that they prefer knives over guns because they are more painful and can be used to cut people up in small pieces.

Donald Trump claims that Democrats complain about the treatment of criminals who use knives to cut up beautiful young women walking home from school, during a debate in Trump North Dakota on June 28th, 2018.
